;;
;; Clean DNS records for bespokefloorsanding.ie
;; All traffic to VPS at 95.179.135.20
;;

;; A Records - Main domain pointing to VPS (proxied for SSL/CDN)
bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	A	95.179.135.20

;; A Record - Mail server (DNS only - NOT proxied)
mail.bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	A	95.179.135.20

;; CNAME - www redirects to main domain
www.bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	CNAME	bespokefloorsanding.ie.

;; MX Record - Mail delivery
bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	MX	10 mail.bespokefloorsanding.ie.

;; TXT - SPF record (who can send email)
bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 a mx ip4:95.179.135.20 ~all"

;; TXT - DMARC policy
_dmarc.bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@bespokefloorsanding.ie"

;; TXT - DKIM (existing key from your server)
mail._domainkey.bespokefloorsanding.ie.	1	IN	TXT	"v=DKIM1; h=sha256; k=rsa; "

;; TXT - Google site verification (keep for Search Console)
bespokefloorsanding.ie.	3600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=IY92iW5We1ReMlDFDwdDeaZh6aM1c4reo-kuq7bibqo"
